metadata.name: Forge
metadata.description: Requires knowledge of movement mechanics used in speedruns. Death skip intended and access to second castle is locked behind Richter Skip with Wolf. Goal is Relic Skip
metadata.author: 3snow_p7im, Dr4gonBlitz, and eldri7ch

alias.comment: Alias Tooth of Vlad as Heart Refresh 1
Alias Ring of Vlad as Heart Refresh 2
